contents.text: Thank you for calling Slack in San Francisco, your central hub for team communication and collaboration.
For product setup, integrations, or technical support, press 1.
For help onboarding new team members, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our onboarding support team.

navigationGoals: I need help setting up Slack accounts and workflows for our new team members.
Help me onboard new members to our veteran support Slack workspace.
I want to configure SCIM-based user provisioning to onboard our new team members into Slack.
Please help me onboard my new team to Slack – I’m not sure how to add them and get them started.
I need help adding my new lab members to our Slack workspace and setting up their accounts.

contents.text: For troubleshooting integrations and apps, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our integrations support specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to troubleshoot and fix errors with our Slack integration.
Troubleshoot the Zoom integration in my veteran group's Slack workspace.
I need help debugging our custom Slack app integration that’s failing to post messages via the API.
I’m having trouble with my calendar integration in Slack; can someone help me fix it?
I’m having trouble getting our GitHub integration to post commit notifications in our team’s channel.

contents.text: For sales inquiries, account management, or billing, press 2.
For new licenses, enterprise pricing, and product demos, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: I’d like enterprise pricing details and a product demo for additional licenses.
Get enterprise pricing details and request a product demo for my nonprofit Slack plan.
I’d like to review Enterprise Grid pricing and purchase additional user licenses for our workspace.
I’d like to know the cost and buy more licenses for my Slack workspace.
I’d like to inquire about enterprise pricing for a university physics research group.

contents.text: For billing questions and subscription management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I need to update my billing information and review my current subscription plan.
Update my billing information for our Slack subscription.
I need to update our Slack subscription billing method and retrieve the latest invoice.
I need help managing my Slack subscription and updating my billing information.
I need assistance updating our subscription payment method and obtaining an invoice for my department.
